title: Easy Peesy French Bread
directions: Combine water, honey, salt and yeast. Let sit for 5-10 mins until there is a foam on top.
Knead in flour until no longer sticky.
Cover with a towel and let it sit for 20 mins. while preheating the oven at 400*
Cut slits in the top and bake for 15-20 mins.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups warm water (like baby bath water)
1 tablespoon honey (We like to use Organic Raw Honey like this.)
1 tablespoon Active Dry Yeast ( or 2 of these little packets)
